You are using social media data which are personal data according to the GDPR, see https://admin.kuleuven.be/privacy/en/studpers/researchers#section-8 and https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics/committees/smec/documenten-1/documents-guidance/recruitment-via-social-media-english.pdf 
Please submit a PRET application for privacy and ethics evaluation https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/ethics/committees/smec/STAFFWhere-and-how-to-apply. Contact pret@kuleuven.be if you have further questions. 
Please update this also in the Compliance Monitoring Tool CMT: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/integrity-ethics/cmt-guidance, contact nationalfunds@kuleuven.be if you need help updating the CMT. 
Please submit an updated DMP as intermediate when you have your approval number
